DOC.detailed_description: Rehabilitation Enhancing Aging Connected Health , REACH , design evaluate benefit novel rehabilitative care program physical function utilize mobile health technology deliver patient center care efficiently health care utilization one year follow . Study staff recruit 76 community dwell old adult primary care patient . The procedure approve IRB Boston RISE cohort study use REACH recruitment , screen enrollment potential participant . This process center Spaulding Cambridge Outpatient Clinic ( SCOC ) . Potential participant contact brief phone screen conduct . Eligible interested participant schedule consent/screen visit . If participant consent , study staff administer three test determine final eligibility study involvement . These include : Mini Mental Status Exam , Short Physical Performance Battery ( SPPB ) Long Distance Corridor Walk . Qualified participant complete baseline 1-year assessment SCOC . The assessment include : Late Life Function Disability Index ( LLFDI ) , Hopkins Verbal Learning Test , Trail Making , Digit Symbol Substitution Test , Katz Comorbidity , depression ( PHQ-9 ) , Activities Specific Balance Scale , Barriers Specific Self-Efficacy Scale , Computer Attitude Scale , McGill Pain Map , Brief Pain Inventory , Figure 8 walk test , grip strength testing , single leg press strength speed testing , ankle/knee ROM , trunk extensor endurance test stair climb power test . The exercise/technology training license physical therapist consist 8-10 ( possibility 16 session ) clinic home visit intersperse 9-month period take place baseline one two location per choice participant : SCOC BU Center Neurorehabilitation . During clinic/home visit , assign exercise video record use Wellpepper clinician version house iPad mini . During in-person visit , PTs remotely monitor exercise adherence , provide feedback , progress exercise program answer participant ' question use chat feature exercise app . PT support taper course 9-month period participant become successful integrating exercise live use provide technology . Over final 3 month study , participant continue perform exercise independently reduce PT involvement . PT support available chat feature participant question concern . Participants contact quarterly interval ask self-report recent fall , hospitalization , ER visit PT ( outside participation study ) . At 6 month LLFDI administer phone . In addition , PT perform performance base assessment clinic visit : SPPB , ankle/knee ROM , trunk extensor endurance test stair climb power test .
